metadata.title: Invicta Men's 17887 Pro Diver Analog Display Swiss Quartz Black Watch
features: Gold tone stainless steel case 48mm diameter x 12.5mm thick; Gold dial; Luminous hands and hour markers
Japanese quartz movement, VD53 Caliber; Assembled in Japan; SR920SW battery included; Watch weight: 188 grams
Black polyurethane and gold tone stainless steel band, 225mm L x 26mm W; Buckle clasp

Flame Fusion crystal; Push/pull crown; Unidirectional stainless steel bezel with gold and blue top bezel ring; Functional Subdials: 60min, 60sec, 24hr; 200 meter water resistant: Suitable for professional marine activity and surface water sports. Suitable for diving.
description: With a bold design, this Invicta chronograph has a poised and calm ambience thatâ€™s sure to have you looking twice.
Sporting an intricate design and subdial system, this bold Invicta chronograph is precise on time and measurement.
